member.name: M:Plugins.Bag.Move(Plugins.InventoryType,System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Move this item to any other possible location (using -1 on the slotIndexDestination or bagIndexDestination and slotIndexDestination, will make the game use the first available destination slot on the choosen inventoryTypeDestination) !!NOTE:!! Be sure to check whether your warehouse is open or not when moving items using this method, !!NOTE:!! or the items will be stuck in space and time until you relog!

The bag Index slot if any(0 is the default bag and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 are the ones you can add to that Inventory)
The slot index starting from 0
